cases.name: Learning Resources v. Trump
cases.summary: The Court ruled 6–3 that IEEPA does not authorize presidential tariffs. Our top prediction (Scenario 1, 55%) correctly forecast the outcome, vote split, majority author, and coalition.

cases.name: Trump v. Slaughter
cases.summary: Challenge to FTC Commissioner removal protections threatens to reshape independent agency structure and presidential control over the administrative state.

cases.name: Villarreal v. Texas
cases.summary: Supreme Court considers whether trial courts can prohibit attorney-client consultation about ongoing testimony during overnight recesses without violating the Sixth Amendment right to counsel.

cases.name: National Republican Senatorial Committee v. Federal Election Commission
cases.summary: Challenge to federal limits on political parties coordinating campaign spending with their own candidates, testing whether First Amendment protects party-candidate collaboration.
